Uses of Class
com.salesforce.omakase.ast.Rule

  • Packages that use Rule 
    Package Description
    com.salesforce.omakase.ast
    Contains general AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) units, such as Rule and top-level AST interfaces, such as Syntax, Commentable and Refinable.
    com.salesforce.omakase.plugin
    Interfaces for plugging new features into the parsing process (rework, validation, etc...).
    com.salesforce.omakase.util
    Utilities and helpers.

    • Uses of Rule in com.salesforce.omakase.ast

      Methods in com.salesforce.omakase.ast that return Rule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Rule Rule.copy() 
      protected Rule Rule.self() 
      Methods in com.salesforce.omakase.ast that return types with arguments of type Rule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SyntaxCollection<Rule,Declaration> Rule.declarations()
      Gets the collection of declarations for this Rule.
      List<Rule> Stylesheet.rules()
      Returns just the Rules within this Stylesheet (does not include at-rules or rules within at-rules).
      SyntaxCollection<Rule,Selector> Rule.selectors()
      Gets the collection of selectors for this Rule.

    • Uses of Rule in com.salesforce.omakase.plugin

      Methods in com.salesforce.omakase.plugin with parameters of type Rule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BasePlugin.rule(Rule rule)
      Override this method and add the Rework, Observe or Validate annotation in order to receive events for Syntax units of type Rule.

    • Uses of Rule in com.salesforce.omakase.util

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Finds rules with prefixed-equivalent pseudo class selectors.
      static Equivalents.EquivalentWalker<Rule,PseudoElementSelector> Equivalents.PSEUDO_ELEMENTS
      Finds rules with prefixed-equivalent pseudo element selectors.
